m1.prefix: Start now: complete Mission 1 — sponsor your first

hero.m2: Great work! Mission 2 — grow 3 leaders in Level 1 to reach 10. {need} more.
hero.m3: Momentum! Mission 3 — multiply into Level 2: help 3 leaders reach 10. {need} to go.
hero.done: You’re building a powerful network. Keep multiplying your leaders.

share.whatsappText: Join me as an India Founder — use my referral link:

m1.title: Mission 1: Build
m1.subtitle: Sponsor your first 10 India Founders. This unlocks your team’s momentum.

m2.title: Mission 2: Duplicate
m2.subtitle: Grow 3 leaders in Level 1 — help each reach their own 10.

m3.title: Mission 3: Multiply
m3.subtitle: Repeat in Level 2 — support 3 leaders to reach 10.

helpSteps.1: Invite with your QR or the bottom bar.
helpSteps.3: Finish Mission 1 (10/10), then help 3 L1 leaders reach 10/10 (Mission 2).
helpSteps.4: Multiply into Level 2: support 3 leaders to reach 10/10 (Mission 3).
helpSteps.5: Tap + to drill into deeper levels. Open a row to view phone & WhatsApp.

prelaunch.title: The India Story (Pre-Launch Module)
prelaunch.subtitle: Learn the story, then follow 5 simple steps to spark curiosity and bring prospects into sessions.

gamma.title: India Story Slides
gamma.tip: Tip: Rotate your phone to landscape for larger slides.
gamma.missingSrc: Missing src for GammaEmbed. Add your Gamma share URL.

checklist.title: 5-Step Pre-Launch
steps: Build and sort your Namelist (20–30 names, A/B/C).
Create curiosity by sharing what you learned casually.
Encourage a call or session to hear directly from leaders.
Follow up within 24 hours and duplicate with new partners.
checklist.autoSave: Your progress is saved automatically. You can come back anytime.
